title: Course for Enhancing Mathematical Competencies Through Smart Learning Activity Design (Large-Scale)

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and proficiency in fundamental smartphone usage
context.additional_context: Process designed for urban adult learners to enhance mathematical problem-solving skills through smartphone-based smart learning activities. Composed of four-stage learning activities applying the Pedagogy of Experiential Complexity (PECSL) model

learning_goals: Learners can explain the design principles of smart learning activities based on the PECSL model and apply them to real-world cases.
Learners can recognize and solve mathematical problems in everyday urban environments using smartphone-based learning tools.
Learners design learning experiences as digital citizens and perform mathematical thinking assessment tasks in complex urban settings.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
